title: "You have slain the (Blank) Drake!" Only works for first dragon
body: The feature Riot added last patch that tells you what dragon the enemy/your team killed only works for the first dragon. After that it goes back to saying "You have slain the dragon"

replies.body: I started seeing this too. Unfortunately I don't have many details. In one of the games I played last night my team lost every drake to the enemy team. I also know we did not have vision in the area. At some point in time my duo pointed out that specific drake wasn't being relayed in chat when the enemy killed it, it was always just "The enemy has slain the dragon". I do not know if we saw the text for the first dragon.

Howdy Dealth,
Just tried repro-ing this. Had some trouble getting the text to display incorrectly. Is there any chance you could attach a video or get some more information about the bug?
-Cheers,
Colin
